name: Tofu Tower (deplanty)
description:
Tofu Tower
 Game description

You are a greedy tofu stuck in a tower. In this tower, some rocks falls and some coins too. It's perfect 'cause you love coins. And you love costumes. All you have to do is jump mid-air and bounce against the wall to collect as many coins as you can without being hurt by rocks. But be careful ! If you fall in the lava, you will be cooked to death. And as anyone know, tofus have 3 lives. So use them wisely.

Information about the game

This game was made using Godot and it's my first one ever :D.

Warning

This game was made for Android and Windows Desktop applications but is playable in the browser (with some lags... Unfortunately).

Known bugs : when playing in the browser from a mobile, you can't use your keyboard to write your pseudo and you will be blocked.

Musics

The musics are from freesound.org :

  • LaCalahorra by rolemu
  • 8-bit Loop by dirtyjewbs
